channel.title: Cache Error
channel.description:
I'm getting this error when I run my client, I know where it is but it can't locate it...
[code=java]RS2 user client - release #317 java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot fi nd the path specified) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:212) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:98) at Classes.Sign.Signlink.run(Signlink.java:50) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:662) [/code]

item.title: Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @New_Legacy New Legacy
item.description:
@New_Legacy wrote:

The client I’ve got downloaded doesn’t have a cache folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“New Legacy, post:3, topic:425373”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=528037.msg3850019#msg3850019 date=1323939518]
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cache\main_file_cache.dat (The system cannot find the path specified)

it cant find a file named ‘main_file_cache.dat’, so if you cant find that then use a different server.
[/quote]
I know where it is, it’s located on line 50 of signlink.java…[/quote]

lmfao, no, its an actual file it should be located in your cache file, obviously its not or it’ll be working.

Read full topic
